data.text: Gumazim, Godɨn Bar Pɨn Itim, deragh an gansɨ an a bagh mangɨtɨ,
Gumazir kam Ikiavɨra Godɨn mɨkɨm suam,
Bar guizbangɨra, God bar deragh nɨ geghuv nɨn gantɨ,
A tuarir amebam uan nguziba ave moghɨn,
Dɨmagaribar aruir duar kuraba, nɨ dar atiatingan markɨ.
Nɨ arɨmariar ekiar dɨmangan nɨ bativamiba,
Nɨ gantɨ arazir kurar gumaziba nɨ gamiba,
Nɨ bizir kurabar atiatia Ikiavɨra Itir God bagha zui.
Kamaghɨn, bizir kuratam nɨ bagh izan kogham.
Egh me uan dafaribar nɨ fueghtɨ,
Nɨ laionba ko, kuruziba ko, laionɨn igiaba ko,
Eghtɨ me na ko mɨkɨmtɨ, kɨ me baragham.
Egh kɨ men ikɨrɨmɨrim men ivezimɨn mɨn a damightɨ
